name: Pets Paradise Resort 3D
synopsis: A whole host of cute cats and dogs are waiting to sample your comprehensive wellness and care programme! Thanks to the impressive 3D effect and the lovingly crafted animations, the animals get up really close and appear as life-like as never before. - 4 different breeds of each animal await you: Golden Retriever, Husky, Dalmatian and German Shepherd, Siamese, British Short Hair, Tabby and Maine Coon. - Enjoy 14 mini-games: Spoil your animal guests with beneficial massages, romp and play with them playing fetch + Grooming, Exercising, Bathing, Pedicure, Swimming, Flea Treatments and more! - Extend your island: Lots of expandable buildings, such as the salon, animal clinic and fitness centre - StreetPassâ„¢: Swap numerous accessories and statistics with other players close by!
